√vā2 'weave'

present: [4.] váyati etc. V.+  váyate etc. B.+  

perfect: ūvus  vavau etc.  uvāya  ūyus etc.  

[aorist: [1.] ūyāt   -- [4.] avāsta  vāsīṣṭa   -- [6.] avāsīt  ]

future: [1.] vayiṣyáti  vayiṣyáte  vāsyati   -- [2.] vātā  

verbal: utá V.+  ūta  ótum  ótave  ótavaí  vā́tave  

secondary: passive: ūyate etc.   -- intensive: vāvā-   -- desiderative: vivāsa-   -- causative: vāyaya-  

derivatives: -vāya  vāyaka C.  -vayana B.S.  vāna S.+  vayúna? V.+  ūti? C.  ótu V.B.  -vātavya C.  vayitṛ B.  veṇī? S.+  vema E.  véman B.+
